coreAttributes.name: level-up pill
coreAttributes.description: A small, bluish-green pill, individually packaged in a foil and plastic wrapper. While most of the text printed on the foil has been scratched out, the remainder labels this as a "incremental rapid imprinting", whatever that means.
coreAttributes.applyEffects: [##npc.incrementExperience(npc.getExperienceNeededForNextLevel(), false)] [npc.Name] [npc.is] filled with a sudden burst of insight, and with it, a newfound confidence and strength of will. [npc.Name] [style.boldGood([npc.verb(gain)] a level!)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] a level-up pill out of its little foil wrapper, before quickly placing it in [npc.her] mouth and swallowing it down.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] a mutagen pill out of its little foil wrapper, before bringing it up to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lips], forcing it into [npc2.her] mouth, and making sure that [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(swallow)] it down.
